meanings.definition: Two people who share the position of captain.
meanings.sent1: The cocaptains led the team to victory.
meanings.sent2: The cocaptains worked together to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The cocaptains joked about who got to wear the captain's hat.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the cocaptains symbolized unity and teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cocaptains standing side by side was inspiring.

meanings.definition: To serve as a co-captain with another person.
meanings.sent1: She cocaptains the team with her best friend.
meanings.sent2: They cocaptain the ship, ensuring a smooth journey.
meanings.sent3: He cocaptains the soccer team, but sometimes forgets the game schedule.
meanings.sent4: Cocaptaining the project, they navigated through challenges together.
meanings.sent5: The duo cocaptains the mission, showing great leadership skills.
